item.title: Shan add a quote by Nathaniel Hawthorne
item.description: "Happiness is like a butterfly which, when pursued, is always beyond our grasp, but, if you will sit down quietly, may alight upon you." -- Nathaniel Hawthorne

item.title: Shan add a quote by Nathaniel Hawthorne
item.description: "Easy reading is damn hard writing." -- Nathaniel Hawthorne

item.title: Shan add a quote by Nathaniel Hawthorne
item.description: "Death should take me while I am in the mood." -- Nathaniel Hawthorne

item.title: Shan add a quote by Meg Howrey
item.description: "Sometimes it's just better to suck up the fact that you are an asshole and decide that tomorrow is the day you will start being the person you intend to be." -- Meg Howrey

item.title: Shan add a quote by Meg Howrey
item.description: "I am here. I am in the present tense. I'm not always here, and sometimes here is a very difficult place. Sometimes it is a labyrinth, or a Minotaur, or a rope I can neither let go of nor follow. It's hard to find the right words, but I guess I would say that it's something like feeling the floor. And that it is my privilege to feel it." -- Meg Howrey
